definition: interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis

sentences.english: This paper studies the primary bronchogenic carcinoma pathogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究原发性支气管肺癌的病因病机。

sentences.english: Emphasizes in the chronic nephritis albuminuria pathogenesis the hepatorenal Yin deficient crucial nature.
sentences.chinese: 强调慢性肾炎蛋白尿病机中肝肾阴虚的关键性。

sentences.english: The therapeutical principle of syndrome differentiation and disease differentiation should be combined.
sentences.chinese: 治疗应谨守病机，辩证与辨病治疗相结合。

sentences.english: The traditional physicians have different understanding to the pathogenesis of formula's syndrome about Tongxie Yaofang.
sentences.chinese: 历代医家对痛泻药方的方证病机存在不同的认识。

sentences.english: But there are not treatises on pathogeny and pathogenesis of plague.
sentences.chinese: 然而，对鼠疫病因病机的研究和介绍缺如。

sentences.english: All these are the major causes of ovulatory dysfunetional sterility.
sentences.chinese: 以上均为排卵功能障碍性不孕的主要病机。

sentences.english: Blood stasis is the most common pathogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 其中血瘀耳窍为最主要的病机。

sentences.english: But stroke will not occur if there is not the induced factor of qi-movement disturbance.
sentences.chinese: 故气机升降逆乱才是中风病病机之关键。

sentences.english: A small number of scholars believe that there is blood heat pathogenesis in CRF.
sentences.chinese: CRF病机复杂，少数学者认为存在血热病机。

sentences.english: Three, precise disease machine, use by the parties.
The basic pathogenesis of diabetes is dryness-heat due to deficiency of yin.
sentences.chinese: 消渴病的基本病机是阴虚燥热。

sentences.english: The modern TCM believes that Yin deficiency and dryness-heat is the basic pathogenesis of wasting thirst.
sentences.chinese: 现代中医学认为，“阴虚燥热”是消渴病的基本病机。

sentences.english: Sketch the mechanism of how does heat syndrome transform into cold syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 试述热证转化为寒证的病机。

sentences.english: To explore the Etiology, Pathogenesis and Treatment of TCM by the theory homogeny of liver and kidney for Parkinson's disease.
sentences.chinese: 从肝肾同源理论探讨帕金森病的病因病机和治法。

definition: pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)
"eight principles," a method of giving a general description and syndrome differentiation (TCM)
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition
localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
to use the same method to treat different diseases (TCM)
superficial syndrome/illness that has not attacked the vital organs of the human body
half outside, half inside/half interior, half exterior
illness having to do with obstruction of urine flow/(Chinese medicine)/retention of urine
